_meanings:
The seventh zodiacal sign
from the natal sign ({#lagna#}); {#tiTO#}
{#ca jAmitraguRAnvitAyAM#} <ls>Ku. 7. 1.</ls> ( 
{#jAmitraM lagnAtsaptamaM sTAnaM#} <ls>Malli.</ls>) {%Note%}--Some
derive the word from {#jAyA#}, because
in astrology, the {#jAmitra#} sign 
indicates the future good-luck of one's
wife ({#jAyAmitraM#}?); but the word is
obviously connected with the Greek
{%diametron%}.
